elements.label: Progress status
elements.description: This setting is used in the 'goal-with-progress' layout. It controls the behavior of progress status functionality.

elements.label: Frontpage introduction banner
elements.description: This setting is only used in the frontpage layout. It can display a title and description in a banner at the top of the frontpage.

elements.label: Frontpage goals grid
elements.description: This setting is only used in the frontpage layout. It can display a title and description above the grid of goal tiles.

elements.label: Frontpage cards
elements.description: This setting is only used in the frontpage layout. It can display any number of 'cards' in 3-column rows, beneath the grid of goal tiles.

elements.label: Map layers
elements.description: Configure any number of layers to display on all indicator maps. A minimum of one layer is required to display maps.

elements.label: Map options
elements.description: Site-wide configuration of map behavior and style.

elements.label: Graph color for headline - high contrast
Create pages
elements.description: This setting can be used to automatically create certain pages.
